OOC: Go ahead and try to bust in my kneecaps. You'll break your hand on the=
 computer screen, though. The truth is, my Chivtrons would be outnumbered a=
nd picked off one by one. Fact is, Sarge has no fighting skills, Zeni has n=
o fighting skills, Perplex has no fighting skills, and that leaves Arrow an=
d Burning Hammer. Burning Hammer is totally confused, and Arrow is too prot=
ective of his kid. The battle between my characters to the death would no d=
oubt, if I played fairly, leave at least one dead of my Chosen mafia or Max=
imals, but all of my Chivtrons would fall. You, Legendary Nemesis (you spel=
led it wrong!) are outrageous and absurd!...

  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: =
Saturday, June 30, 2001 10:36 PM
  Subject: Re: Dear owners of the Cybers..=
.


  OOC: ::Busts souls kneecaps in for Rauq since he hasnt posted yet:: 
=
  Keep it IC, you act like your chivtrons wouldnt have a chance. When 
  yo=
u control chars in seperate factions and they get into a fight with 
  each=
 other you have to play them how you would play them if they were 
  fighti=
ng a seperate faction. Just because your chars hate each other 
  doesnt me=
an you have to kill the chars of one faction off. Thats just 
  plain dumb =
its like saying "Oh, I like this faction so all these guys 
  have to die n=
ow because I cant handle them attacking each other." 
  Look at Yan, he has=
 the alliance against the Maximals, he doesnt go 
  around killing his alli=
ance chars and maximal chars simply because 
  they cant or wont coexist. o=
u should try to do the same.

  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thec=
ode@p...> wrote:
  > OOC: Okay, I'm sorry, but it's the truth. My character=
s could not 
  co-exist in the same faction like that, ad then what? Make t=
hem act 
  unrealistic? To keep them in character of course the Mafia would=
 
  attack the Chivtrons, and then  who would I have die? As much as I 
  l=
ike them, my Chivtrons would end up dying. It's not a threat, 
  honest, I'=
m just pointing out what would really happen. Sorry if you 
  took it as a =
threat...

  >   ----- Original Message -----

. 
  >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 10:24 PM

  >   If anyone conti=
nues to post on the subject of factions and stuff 
  OOC, I'll have rAuq kn=
eecap them. Now, for the (hopefully) final 
  commant on this:
  > 
  >   F=
irst of all: Soulstice, that was just plain cheap. Its threats 
  like thos=
e that make people not want people's chars in their 
  faction. "If you do =
this, I'll kill off my chars on your side" is 
  exactly what makes faction=
 commanders begin to rely on your chars 
  less and less, resulting in them=
 being ignored.
  > 
  >   Second of all: as Gunthers said, quit trying to =
predict what the 
  Alliance is gonna do. You're all wrong so far anyways.
